```{r}
library(sf)
dsn <- system.file("shape/nc.shp", package="sf")
nc <- st_read(dsn)

wkt <- readLines(system.file("shape/nc.prj", package = "sf"))
sf:::CPL_crs_from_wkt(wkt)

mls <- "POINT (20 30)"
a <- sf::st_sfc(sf:::CPL_sfc_from_wkt(mls))

x <-  sf:::gv(dsn)

```

We need "agr.R", "sf.r" and "sp.R".
